item.title: Sega's Next House Of The Dead Adaptation Gets Major Filming Update From Director
item.description: Paul W.S. Anderson shines a light on the status of his House of the Dead movie, hinting that production is on the verge of soon beginning.

item.title: Milla Jovovich's New Fantasy Movie Isn't Her $1.2 Billion Franchise Replacement After All, Poor Rotten Tomatoes Score Confirms
item.description: In the Lost Lands has just been released, but its reviews indicate that it may not be the return to form for Milla Jovovich that was expected.

item.title: Robert Downey Jr. Reflects On 17 Years Of Playing Iron Man Ahead Of His Doctor Doom Role
item.description: Ahead of his MCU return as the villainous Doctor Doom, Robert Downey Jr. looks back on his time playing Marvel's Iron Man at this year's SXSW.
